intro: Put your detective skills to the test in a thrilling solitaire mystery!
description:
Solitaire Crime Stories is an exciting solitaire-investigation game where you take on the roles of journalist Lana Whitt and sheriff's assistant Bill Maite to investigate crimes in the sunny little town of Springdale. 
Meet with the town’s people and hear some harrowing stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat! 
Complete fun Solitaire challenges, investigate crimes, and make the criminals come clean!

- Colorful and intuitive solitaire challenges
- Finish compelling quests
- Solve hundreds of solitaire levels
- Crack the case and catch the killer
